kofi package¶

Submodules¶

kofi.cli module¶

Console script for kofi.

kofi.config module¶

Read and validate the config.

kofi.config.merge_configs(config: Dict[str, Any], shell_config: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any][source]¶

Merge the configuration from file with the one from command line parameters, favouring the latter.

kofi.config.read_config(conf_file: Optional[str] = None) → Dict[str, Any][source]¶

Find the configuration file and parse it.

kofi.graphql module¶

This module holds the GraphQL implementation.

kofi.graphql.get_view(graphiql: bool) → aiohttp.web_urldispatcher.View[source]¶

Get the graphql aiohttp view.

kofi.graphql.is_correct(root: Any, info: Any, **args: Dict[str, Any]) → bool[source]¶
kofi.graphql.is_omocode(root: Any, info: Any, **args: Dict[str, Any]) → bool[source]¶
kofi.graphql.resolve_interpolate(root: Any, info: graphql.execution.base.ResolveInfo, **args: Any) → Dict[str, str][source]¶
kofi.graphql.resolve_verify(root: Any, info: Any, **args: Any) → Dict[str, bool][source]¶

kofi.log module¶

In this module are the tools to configure the logger.

kofi.log.setup_console_handler(fmt: logging.Formatter, level: int) → logging.Handler[source]¶

Setup the handler that outputs on console.

kofi.log.setup_file_handler(filename: str, fmt: logging.Formatter, level: int) → logging.Handler[source]¶

Setup the file handler.

kofi.log.setup_formatter() → logging.Formatter[source]¶

Setting up a custom formatter.

kofi.log.setup_log(config: Dict[str, Any]) → logging.Logger[source]¶

Setup the logger.

kofi.log.setup_syslog_handler(fmt: logging.Formatter, level: int) → logging.Handler[source]¶

Setup the syslog handler.

kofi.main module¶

The webserver entrypoint.

kofi.main.run() → None[source]¶

KoFi entrypoint.

kofi.main.run_from_shell(config: Dict[str, Any]) → None[source]¶

KoFi shell entrypoint.

kofi.main.setup(config: Dict[str, Any], loop: Optional[asyncio.events.AbstractEventLoop] = None) → aiohttp.web_app.Application[source]¶

Setup the application.

kofi.main.start(app: aiohttp.web_app.Application) → None[source]¶

Start the application.

kofi.rest module¶

The views that handle the REST API are defined here.

async kofi.rest.interpolate(req: aiohttp.web_request.Request) → aiohttp.web_response.Response[source]¶

Validate and handle interpolate request.

async kofi.rest.verify(req: aiohttp.web_request.Request) → aiohttp.web_response.Response[source]¶

Validate and handle verify request.

kofi.routes module¶

The routes.

There is a REST API and a GraphQL API.

REST:

/api/verify [GET] query parameters:

  • cf: the Codice Fiscale string

returns:

  • {"isCorrect": boolean, "isOmocode": boolean, "cf": str}

/api/interpolate [GET] query parameters:

  • name

  • surname

  • gender

  • date_of_birth in YYYYMMDD format

  • place_of_birth

returns:

  • {"cf": str}

GraphQL:

/graphql accepts the following queries

query verify(cf: String!) {
    isCorrect
    isOmocode
}

query interpolate(
    name: String!
    surname: String!
    gender: genderType!
    dateOfBirth: String!
    placeOfBirth: String!
) {
    codiceFiscale
}

being genderType an enum comprising M and F values

kofi.routes.generate_app_routes(conf: Dict[str, Any]) → List[aiohttp.web_routedef.RouteDef][source]¶

Generates the app routes using the configuration parameters.

Module contents¶

Top-level package for KoFi.
